zh.activity_invite_content_two: 2. 活动持续14天，只要对平台账户有过充值的用户就拥有邀请资格；
zh.activity_invite_content_three: 3. 邀请者可在活动页面右侧查看自己的邀请码，或发送邀请链接给自己的好友注册；
zh.activity_invite_content_four: 4. 被邀请用户注册时必须填写或显示邀请人的邀请码才算邀请成功；
zh.activity_invite_content_five: 5. 每个好友用户只能被邀请一次，平台老用户不可被邀请，同IP、MAC、邮箱用户将视作同一用户；
zh.activity_invite_content_six: 6. 每个邀请者成功邀请的前10名好友拥有邀请奖励，邀请奖励有限，先到先得；
zh.activity_invite_content_seven: 7. 邀请名额有限，活动期间邀请总额2000名，每日上限150名；
zh.activity_invite_content_eight_a: 注册奖励：完成注册，邀请双方都将获得0.001ETH的奖励，该注册奖励只能用于投注；
zh.activity_invite_content_eight_b: 投注奖励：通过平台账户投注，邀请双方都将获得被邀请用户前3笔投注额的5‰返利，单人单笔最高10ETH，即单笔投注最高带来20ETH的返利。
zh.activity_statement_content_one: 1. 获得活动奖励的用户，活动期间及结束后7日内均无任何平台账户充值行为的，官方将有权回收其账号内的活动奖励。
zh.activity_statement_content_two: 2. 官方对于利用系统漏洞谋取不正当利益的用户及账号保留撤销资格、资产追溯及法律诉讼的权力。
zh.activity_statement_content_three: 3. 官方保留在用户不知情的情况下添加、修改或中止任一活动的权力。
zh.activity_statement_content_four: 4. 官方拥有活动的最终解释权。如有任何疑问请联系官方客服：support@coingame.com。
zh.activity_invite_top_title: 一人邀请、双方获利、单笔最高10ETH！

en.activity_invite_content_two: 2. 14-day duration, within which user with platform account deposit history has the invitation privilege;
en.activity_invite_content_three: 3. An inviter can check his invitation code on the right of the acitivity page, or send invitation link to friends for registration;
en.activity_invite_content_four: 4. An invitee should fill in or show the invitation code from the inviter when registering to ensure sucessful registration;
en.activity_invite_content_five: 5. One user friend one invitation; old user cannot be invited; any user with the same IP, MAC, email box will be deemed as the same user;
en.activity_invite_content_six: 6. Each inviter succeed in inviting first 10 friends has the invitation bonus which is limited and subject to first come first served principle;
en.activity_invite_content_seven: 7. Invitation quota limited to 2000, 150 per day;
en.activity_invite_content_eight_a: Registration bonus: Upon completion of registration, both parties will receive a 0.001 ETH reward which can only be used for prediction;
en.activity_invite_content_eight_b: Predicting placement bonus: Place predicting money to the platform account,both inviter and invitee will be rewarded with 5‰ of the first three amounts the invited user placed; max 10ETH for one user each time, i.e. max 20ETH rewards for each predicting placement.
en.activity_statement_content_one: 1. Rewarded user with no deposit to the platform account during the activity time and within 7 days after such promotion activity will entitle the official party to reclaim his/her activity rewards in the account.
en.activity_statement_content_two: 2. The official party reserves the right to revoke eligibility, trace asset and initiate legal proceedings against users and accounts that attack systematic vulnerabilities to gain undue advantage.
en.activity_statement_content_three: 3. The official party reserves the right to add, modify or suspend any activity without the user's acknowledgement.
en.activity_statement_content_four: 4. The official party has the final interpretation of the activity. If you have any questions, please contact support@coingame.com.
en.activity_invite_top_title: One Invite, Double Interest, Max 10 ETH Each!

ko.activity_invite_content_two: 2. 이벤트는 14일간 진행되며 플랫폼 계정에 충전한 모든 유저는 요청 자격이 있습니다.
ko.activity_invite_content_three: 3. 유저는 이벤트 페이지 오른쪽에서 요청 코드를 확인할 수 있으며 친구에게 링크를 보낼 수 있습니다.
ko.activity_invite_content_four: 4. 요청 받은 유저는 회원가입 시, 해당 요청 코드를 입력해야 요청성공으로 간주됩니다.
ko.activity_invite_content_five: 5. 유저는 1인당 요청을 1회만 받을 수 있으고 신규 유저만 요청 받을 수 있으며, 동일한 IP, MAC, 이메일 주소 사용 시, 동일한 유저로 간주됩니다.
ko.activity_invite_content_six: 6. 유저는 총 10명 친구를 요청하는데 소요되는 시간 선착순으로 보상을 획득할 수 있습니다.
ko.activity_invite_content_seven: 7. 요청인수는 제한되어 있으며 이벤트 기간  총 2000명 요청이 가능하며 하루 최대 요청인수는 150명 입니다.
ko.activity_invite_content_eight_a: 회원가입 보상: 회원가입한 후 요청한 유저와 요청받은 유저 모두 0.001ETH 보상을 받게 됩니다.(이 이벤트 보상은 베팅에서만 사용 가능).
ko.activity_invite_content_eight_b: 베팅 보상: 플랫폼 계정으로 베팅를 하면, 요청한 유저와 요청받은 유저 모두 지난 3회 베팅 금액의 5‰금액 보상을 받을 수 있으며, 1인당 1회에 최대 10 ETH를 보상, 즉 1회 베팅으로 요청한 유저와 요청받은 유저는 최대 총 20ETH를 보상을 받을 수 있습니다.
ko.activity_statement_content_one: 1. 이벤트 보상을 받은 유저가 이벤트 시간 및 끝난 후 7일 이내에 플랫폼 계정에 충전하지 않을 경우, 코인게임은 해당 유저 계정의 이벤트 보상을 회수할 권리가 있습니다.
ko.activity_statement_content_two: 2. 코인게임은 유저가 시스템 버그를 악용해서 부당 이익을 추구하는 경우 유저의 자격을 취소하고, 법률 소송의 권한을 보유합니다.
ko.activity_statement_content_three: 3. 코인게임은 유저에게 공지하지 않고 이벤트를 추가, 수정 또는 중단할 권리를 보유합니다
ko.activity_statement_content_four: 4. 코인게임은 이벤트에 대한 최종 해석을 진행할 권리가 있습니다. 질문이 있으면 고객서비스 이메일로( support@coingame.org) 문의하십시오.
ko.activity_invite_top_title: 한 사람이 요청하면 요청한 유저와 요청받은 유저 모두 최대 10ETH 보상을 받을 수 있습니다!

ja.activity_register_title_close: イベント・ルールをチェック
ja.activity_invite_content_two: 2. イベント期間は14日間で、プラットフォームのアカウントへチャージしたユーザーのみ招待権限を持つ；
ja.activity_invite_content_three: 3. 招待者は、イベントページの右側に自分の招待コードをチェックしたり、友達に招待リンクを発送し登録したりできる；
ja.activity_invite_content_four: 4. 招待された者の初回登録に、招待者の招待コードを記入または表示する必要がある；
ja.activity_invite_content_five: 5. 友達ユーザーは1回のみ招待される、プラットフォームの旧ユーザーを招待できない。IP、MAC、メールの同じユーザーは同一ユーザーとみなされる；
ja.activity_invite_content_six: 6. 招待者は招待に成功した10人の友達に招待ボーナスがある、上限があるので早いもの勝ちだ；
ja.activity_invite_content_seven: 7. 招待できる人数は限られており、イベント中に、招待の総数が2,000名で、1日あたり最大150名と制限されています；
ja.activity_invite_content_eight: 8. 招待のボーナスは二種類に分けられる；
ja.activity_invite_content_eight_a: 新規登録ボーナス：新規登録完了後、招待者及び招待される者は0.001ETHをもらえる、新規登録ボーナスはベッティングのみ使用できる；
ja.activity_invite_content_eight_b: ベッティング奨励：プラットフォーム利用によるベッティングして、招待者及び招待される者は最初3回のベッティング金額の5‰ボーナスをもらえ、一人一回でボーナスは10ETH、つまりベッティング一回で最高20ETHをもらえる；
ja.activity_statement_content_one: 1. イベントでボーナスを得たユーザーは、イベント期間及び終了後7日以内にプラットフォームへのチャージ行為がない者は、当サイトはその奨励を回収する権利を持っています。
ja.activity_statement_content_two: 2. 当サイトは、バグの不正利用して利益を得るユーザー及びアカウントに、資格、資産税の遡及および法律訴訟の権限を留保します。
ja.activity_statement_content_three: 3. 当サイトには、ユーザーが知らない状況でいずれかのイベントの追加、更正また中止する権限を留保します。
ja.activity_statement_content_four: 4. 当サイトにはイベントについて最終解釈権を持っています。ご不明な点がありましたら、カスタマーサービスsupport@coingame.comまでご連絡下さい。
ja.activity_invite_top_title: 友達一人を誘い、二人で利益獲得、ベッティング一回で最高10ETH！

ru.activity_invite_content_two: 2. Within 14 days of the activities, any user making a deposit to the account will be qualified to invite others;
ru.activity_invite_content_three: 3. The inviter will be able to view the invitation code on the right side of the event page, and can send friends an invitation link to register;
ru.activity_invite_content_four: 4. When the invitee registers, the invitation code of the inviter must be filled in or displayed for the invitation to be complete;
ru.activity_invite_content_five: 5. Friends can only be invited once, users on the old platform cannot be invited, users with the same IP, MAC, and email address will be treated as a single user;
ru.activity_invite_content_six: 6. The first 10 friends successfully invited by the inviter will receive an invitation reward, which is limited and given on a first-come, first-served basis;
ru.activity_invite_content_seven: 7. Invitation quota is limited to 2000k, and 150 per day;
ru.activity_invite_content_eight: 8. There are two types of invitation rewards:
ru.activity_invite_content_eight_a: Registration bonus: Upon registration, both parties will receive a reward of 0.001ETH, which can only be used for predictions;
ru.activity_invite_content_eight_b: Prediction Bonus: By making a prediction on the platform account, both parties will receive a discount of 5% on the first three predictions made by the invited users. Both will receive a maximum of 10ETH each, i.e., a single prediction may be rewarded with a maximum of 20ETH
ru.activity_statement_content_one: 1. If the user who receives the activity reward does not make a deposit to the account within 7 days during and after the activities, the official party has the right to reclaim the activity reward from the user’s account.
ru.activity_statement_content_two: 2. The official party reserves the right to revoke the qualification of, trace the assets of, and take legal proceedings against the user(s) and user account(s), in case of the user(s) leveraging system vulnerabilities for illegitimate interests.
ru.activity_statement_content_three: 3. The official party reserves the right to add, modify, or suspend any activity at any point without informing the user(s).
ru.activity_statement_content_four: 4. The official party has the final interpretation of the event (is the final authority on any event). If you have any questions, please contact our official customer service team: support@coingame.com.
ru.activity_invite_top_title: One invite, double interest, Max 10ETH each!

vi.activity_invite_content_two: 2. Within 14 days of the activities, any user making a deposit to the account will be qualified to invite others;
vi.activity_invite_content_three: 3. The inviter will be able to view the invitation code on the right side of the event page, and can send friends an invitation link to register;
vi.activity_invite_content_four: 4. When the invitee registers, the invitation code of the inviter must be filled in or displayed for the invitation to be complete;
vi.activity_invite_content_five: 5. Friends can only be invited once, users on the old platform cannot be invited, users with the same IP, MAC, and email address will be treated as a single user;
vi.activity_invite_content_six: 6. The first 10 friends successfully invited by the inviter will receive an invitation reward, which is limited and given on a first-come, first-served basis;
vi.activity_invite_content_seven: 7. Invitation quota is limited to 2000k, and 150 per day;
vi.activity_invite_content_eight: 8. There are two types of invitation rewards:
vi.activity_invite_content_eight_a: Registration bonus: Upon registration, both parties will receive a reward of 0.001ETH, which can only be used for predictions;
vi.activity_invite_content_eight_b: Prediction Bonus: By making a prediction on the platform account, both parties will receive a discount of 5% on the first three predictions made by the invited users. Both will receive a maximum of 10ETH each, i.e., a single prediction may be rewarded with a maximum of 20ETH
vi.activity_statement_content_one: 1. If the user who receives the activity reward does not make a deposit to the account within 7 days during and after the activities, the official party has the right to reclaim the activity reward from the user’s account.
vi.activity_statement_content_two: 2. The official party reserves the right to revoke the qualification of, trace the assets of, and take legal proceedings against the user(s) and user account(s), in case of the user(s) leveraging system vulnerabilities for illegitimate interests.
vi.activity_statement_content_three: 3. The official party reserves the right to add, modify, or suspend any activity at any point without informing the user(s).
vi.activity_statement_content_four: 4. The official party has the final interpretation of the event (is the final authority on any event). If you have any questions, please contact our official customer service team: support@coingame.com.
vi.activity_invite_top_title: One invite, double interest, Max 10ETH each!

zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_two: 2. 活動持續14天，只要對平臺帳戶有過充值的用戶就擁有邀請資格；
zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_three: 3. 邀請者可在活動頁面右側查看自己的邀請碼，或發送邀請連結給自己的好友註冊；
zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_four: 4. 被邀請使用者註冊時必須填寫或顯示邀請人的邀請碼才算邀請成功；
zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_five: 5. 每個好友用戶只能被邀請一次，平臺老用戶不可被邀請，同IP、MAC、郵箱用戶將視作同一用戶；
zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_six: 6. 每個邀請者成功邀請的前10名好友擁有邀請獎勵，邀請獎勵有限，先到先得；
zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_seven: 7. 邀請名額有限，活動期間邀請總額2000名，每日上限150名；
zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_eight_a: 註冊獎勵：完成註冊且成功登錄，邀請雙方都將獲得0.001ETH的獎勵；
zh-Hant.activity_invite_content_eight_b: 投注獎勵：通過平臺帳戶投注，邀請雙方都將獲得被邀請用戶前3筆投注額的5‰返利，單人單筆最高10ETH，即單筆投注最高帶來20ETH的返利。
zh-Hant.activity_statement_content_one: 1. 獲得活動獎勵的用戶，活動期間及結束後7日內均無任何平臺帳戶充值行為的，官方將有權回收其帳號內的活動獎勵。
zh-Hant.activity_statement_content_two: 2. 官方對於利用系統漏洞謀取不正當利益的用戶及帳號保留撤銷資格、資產追溯及法律訴訟的權力。
zh-Hant.activity_statement_content_three: 3. 官方保留在使用者不知情的情況下添加、修改或中止任一活動的權力。
zh-Hant.activity_statement_content_four: 4. 官方擁有活動的最終解釋權。如有任何疑問請聯繫官方客服：support@coingame.com。
zh-Hant.activity_invite_top_title: 一人邀請、雙方獲利、單筆最高10ETH！
